bio: Started programming five years ago. Used to spend all day writing code in CeSIUM, still do from time to time. Elixir enthusiast, working @ Marmelasoft. Proud owner of a |> tattoo.

name: David Machado
bio: Full-stack developer, started his coding journey at sixteen. As a vocational highschool graduation project he built a CSS framework. Currently studying Computer Science @ University of Minho.

name: Rui Lopes
bio: Started programming four years ago and since there never stopped. Loves Python and its starting to love Elixir too. Joined CeSIUM to develop a lot more skills and meet new people. Aiming to install Arch Linux for the 15th time last week.
